name: AWSConfigConfigRuleSourceSourceDetails
description: SourceDetails is a property of the AWS Config ConfigRule Source property that specifies the source and type of event that triggers AWS Config to evaluate your AWS resources.

properties.name: EventSource
properties.description: The source, such as an AWS service, that generate events, triggering AWS Config to evaluate your AWS resources. For valid values, see the SourceDetail data type in the AWS Config API Reference.

properties.name: MessageType
properties.description: The type of Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) message that triggers AWS Config to run an evaluation.
